SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface ClientInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiClient, SocketClient
public interface ClientInterface
This interface defines the methods for client-server communication and the getters and setters for the client. Clients can interact with the server by creating and joining games, managing credentials, exchanging messages, drawing cards, placing cards on the board, and fetching various game state information. It also provides methods to access and modify client-specific data such as visible cards, game state, player number, opponent data, and more.

    • newGame

      UUID newGame(int players, String gameName) throws IOException
      Method to create a new game.
      Parameters:
      players - The number of players in the game.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the game created.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • joinGame

      boolean joinGame(UUID game) throws IOException
      Method to join an existing game.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the game was joined successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • checkCredentials

      boolean checkCredentials(String username, String password) throws IOException
      Method to check the credentials of a user. This method is needed every time a user create a new username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      True if the credentials are valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
